## Potential Rules for Col1a1 in Cancer Associated Fibroblasts (CAFs): **Rule 1:** In cancer associated fibroblasts, Col1a1 increases α-SMA expression. **Justification:** Collagen type 1 (Col1a1) is a major component of the extracellular matrix (ECM) and its deposition is often increased in tumors. This increased collagen deposition is often associated with the activation of fibroblasts into myofibroblasts, which express α-smooth muscle actin (α-SMA). [Document 3, 10, 13, 19, 21, 22, 29, 30, 33, 38, 44, 48, 50, 56, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 66, 69, 70, 72, 74] **Rule 2:** In cancer associated fibroblasts, Col1a1 increases ECM remodeling. **Justification:** Collagen type 1 (Col1a1) is a major component of the extracellular matrix (ECM) and its deposition is often increased in tumors. This increased collagen deposition is often associated with the activation of fibroblasts into myofibroblasts, which are involved in ECM remodeling.
